entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. A few showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thundershower late this afternoon. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 27 April 2023
